content.p: Associate Professor, Head of Department (UNM) Civil Engineering, My research interest: Structural Engineering and Structural Dynamics. Wind induced vibration control of long span suspension bridges. Seismic vulnerability analysis of low and high-rise structures. Light-weight concrete. High strength concrete. Structural Engineering Structural Dynamics Advanced Concrete Structures Advanced Concrete Properties Wind and Earthquake Engineering Earthquake Engineering Wind Engineering telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
